    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change transfer_message and no_agent_available_message columns from string to translated_text</description>
        <name>Modify sys_cs_live_agent_setup columns</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateColumnType("transfer_message");
updateColumnType("no_agent_available_message");

function updateColumnType(element) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
    gr.addQuery("name", "sys_cs_live_agent_setup");
    gr.addQuery("internal_type", "string");
    gr.addQuery("element", element);
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.query();
    if(gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue("internal_type", "translated_text");
        gr.update();
    }
}]]></script>
